rules_text:
Exile up to one target creature or Vehicle you control and up to one target creature or Vehicle an opponent controls. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner’s control at the beginning of the next end step.
Draw a card.
notes:
WU:
 - Five or more artifacts
 - Metalcraft
GW:
 - Odd MVs
 - +1/+1 counters
WB:
 - triggered abilities
 - flicker
RW:
 - MV 3 or less
 - Shipwright
